title.narrative: SUR 2.1 SYSTEM STRENGTHENING IN Early Child Development (ECD)

description.narrative: Strengthened national frameworks, policies, plans and standards to increase access to high-quality, equitable, inclusive, and holistic early childhood development, learning and care environments for girls and boys (0-8 years) and their families by 2021, including in emergencies, which contributes to Child Health, Early Childhood Development, Early Learning, Health And Emergencies, Learning Outcomes, Wash In Schools And Ecd Centres. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, all children and adolescents, especially the most disadvantaged among them, have improved their education and developmental outcomes and accessed equitable and inclusive learning environments across the life cycle, including in emergencies.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened national frameworks, policies, plans and standards to increase access to high-quality, equitable, inclusive, and holistic early childhood development, learning and care environments for girls and boys (0-8 years) and their families by 2021, including in emergencies

description.narrative: Multisectoral interventions for ECD including strengthening baby-friendly care, optimal nutrition, parental awareness and counseling on early stimulation and nutrition, are essential for learning. The National Code of Marketing of Breastmilk Substitutes was finalized and presented to the Ministry of Health in Suriname. | Status:Met | As-of Date:17/01/2020

title.narrative: Percentage of children (36-59 months) on track in at least three of four development domains, total and disaggregated by gender, poorest quintile and urban/rural
Country using the ECD Index (MICS) to report on SDG target 4.2.1 (early childhood development)
ECD Partnerships, including ECD Action Network (ECDAN), established at national level to coordinate the programme interventions and advocacy
